comment.author: 53529326@N06
comment._content: This is such an incredibly dynamic photo that really feels as though it is suspended in something ethereal. I have no idea what it would be like to be the pilot, but I feel like this photo begins to capture the intensity and chaos that an experimental supersonic flight would have.
